articles.title: Cathay Pacific to cancel some passenger flights in January amid tougher curbs - CNA
articles.description:
Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific will cancel some passenger flights in January because of operational and travel curbs at a time when the Asian financial centre has tightened quarantine requirements, the airline said on Wednesday (Dec 22).

articles.title: Asian share markets higher despite Omicron threat - Reuters

articles.title: Asia-Pacific Roundup: New Zealand probes role of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine, myocarditis in three deaths - Regulatory Focus
